review: *** ********* ** ****** * **** **** ******* I connected with him via video consultation for my mother's Cancer meditation induced  Diabetes and Neuropathy. He is absolutely an amazing person with true empathy towards his patients. He thoroughly listened and understands my mother's complex health problems and treatment regimen and  provided the best treatment options. Even he gave his extra time and efforts to solve the things. He is a very caring, friendly and knowledgeable doctor. I literally have a very nice experience and love his scientific way of treatment...Thank you so much Sir...Highly recommendüëç

tags: None
review:
Dr. Nikhilesh is extremely attentive, helpful and a superb doctor. He patiently listened to our issues, explained all little details related to ailments and treatments, putting our minds at ease. 

He has treated us at multiple points. In the latest instance, I was down with Typhoid+COVID at once. He helped nail it down quickly and start the treatment asap. My mom was down with COVID too at the same time. He treated her as well and needless to say both of us have recovered well and without any hassles. 

Can't recommend him enough. Thank you so much Dr. Pathak for all your help through the tough period.

review: Dr. Nikhilesh is an awesome doctor and an amazing person. He cares for his patients. Listens to our problems, available on calls and messages. He is soft spoken and very respectful towards patients. He makes his patients at ease by his friendly and sweet personality. Highly recommend him.

review:
Consulting Dr Nikhilesh has helped me improve my over-all health. Despite the treatment for which I initially consulted him (throat infection), he also recommended natural remedies to ease pain and discomfort for my headache/migraine.

He is such a friendly person and my go to doctor as he always listens patiently to all my problems. As a physician he is extremely skilled and offers best treatment. Would definitely recommend him.
